page.title: 10Social Concerns in Dalkeith
page.content:
There are several institutions providing care for those suffering from physical or mental handicaps. Lugton school caters for children with special needs, learning or behavioural difficulties. Westfield school is a special school for the mentally handicapped. Whitehill Adult Training Centre offers training in social and employment skills for the less able. There is also a psychiatric day unit in Woodburn, and Esk Valley College offers courses for the handicapped.
Dalkeith also has a full range of social services for the elderly; from home help and meals on wheels to Westfield Park Old Person's Home and sheltered housing in Esk Place. There is also a Citizen's Advice Bureau and a Womens Aid Centre.
